title: undate/patch problem
body: i have been trying to download the new patch but it gets up 99% and then doesn't finish waited a whole day and nothing .. is there a bug or something ?? what can I do to fix it ??

replies.body:
An unstable or poor connection to the server that prevents your patcher from receiving the last bit of files is the most common causes of patching issues at 99%. To resolve this, I suggest taking a look at the steps outlined in our [connection troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if you noticed any changes after taking those steps.
